alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 6:43AM PST until March 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Local gusts up to 70 mph over exposed peaks and ridges. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley and the western Mojave Desert of San Bernardino County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winds will make driving difficult for motorcycles...large trucks...trailers and campers. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong crosswinds will occur on US 395 in the Owens Valley and western San Bernardino County.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
